data.statement: The UK Parliament consists of the House of Commons and the House of Lords.
data.explanation: The UK Parliament is bicameral, consisting of two houses: the House of Commons (elected) and the House of Lords (appointed and hereditary peers).
The Battle of Hastings was fought on 14 October 1066 between the Norman-French army of William, the Duke of Normandy, and an English army under the Anglo-Saxon King Harold Godwinson.

data.front: What are the four countries that make up the United Kingdom?
data.back: England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland
data.explanation: The United Kingdom is a sovereign state made up of four constituent countries: England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.
